name: 404 Page
mouse: I don't have a joke for this mouseover text.
description:
Wut.
What are you doing here?!

name: The "First" Comic
mouse: Here goes nothing... Expect to see a lot of art shifts and site redesigns.
description:
Hey! Welcome to the comic which will probably get one comic per month! (or not)

Normally webcomics have more than one panel on the first comic,
but I'm... Uhh, actually, I'm not sure why I did so.

EDIT (15th of October 2017):
I'm leaving this here so future me can trash talk past me's choices of having a random scribble be the first comic.

name: To the Sea
mouse: So he just set out on the sea without food, water and nothing to keep himself busy? What an idiot.
description:
Oh hi.
Actually first comic.

The orange colored guy sets out to the sea to find uncharted isles.
He's not going to get far, is he?

also yes i know art style looks bad
(just in case there are more than 0 readers.)

name: The Island
mouse: Um, yeah, that "island" doesn't have any trees or anything important, how are you supposed to survive there?
description:
Oh wow, he actually found somethi- actually lemme check...
Yup, that's an uncharted island, if you ask me!

name: A strange sight
mouse: Where'd you get a shirt and a new pair of pants?!
description:
Mr. Orange Guy whateverhisnameis lands (and somehow sinks the raft) on the shore.
What could await on this strange island?
_yowza_: That's a nice filename you've got there.

name: A mysterious stone structure
mouse: This guy is WEIRD. Look at his hair. Where did it come from?!
description:
Look, a stone structure that's probably there for no reason!
Oh and I guess there's a pit there too.

I'M NOT LATE FOR THE DECEMBER COMIC SO EVERYTHING'S FINE- I mean what

name: A long fall
mouse: Okay, that's it, I'm out. HOW DID HE CHANGE CLOTHES WHILIST IN THE AIR?!
description:
"Well that was a stupid first month of the year, time to say goodbye to it, forgot absol- OH RIGHT THE COMIC" - Lazy idiot

Inevitable filler is here.
